traits.name: Keen Senses
description: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
description: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
description: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

baseAttacks.name: Bite
description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

baseAttacks.name: Sting
description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour.
If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

feats.name: Silent Flight
description: The pseudodragon's movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

feats.name: Winged Interference
description: When a creature within 5 feet of the pseudodragon attacks its master, the pseudodragon can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
This reaction can be used a number of times equal to the pseudodragon's proficiency bonus per long rest.

feats.name: Arcane Perch
description: While perched on its master, the pseudodragon grants advantage on one saving throw against a spell once per long rest.

feats.name: Subtle Invisibility
description: As a bonus action, the pseudodragon becomes invisible until the start of its next turn or until it makes an attack.
Uses equal to the pseudodragon's proficiency bonus per long rest.

feats.name: Draconic Focus
description: Once per long rest, when the pseudodragon forces a creature to make a saving throw, it can impose disadvantage on that saving throw.

feats.name: Adaptive Venom
description: Prerequisite: Venom Control trait.
The pseudodragon can alter the nature of its venom in response to different prey.
When the pseudodragon hits a creature with Sting, it can choose one of the following damage types for the venom instead of poison: acid, lightning, psychic.
The chosen damage type replaces the poison damage and poison condition for that attack.
Any additional effects granted by Venom Control apply normally.
Once the pseudodragon changes the damage type of its Sting in this way, it cannot do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

attacks.name: Precision Sting
description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 1d4 + 2 piercing damage plus venom.
On a failed saving throw, the target's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

attacks.name: Wing Buffet
description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet.

attacks.name: Venom Mark
description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature.
Hit: 1d4 + 2 piercing damage.
Until the end of the pseudodragon's next turn, the pseudodragon and its master have advantage on the first attack roll made against the target.

attacks.name: Psychic Needle
description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 1d6 + 2 psychic damage.
The target has disadvantage on the next concentration check it makes before the end of its next turn.

specialSkills.name: Draconic Watcher
description: The pseudodragon gains advantage on initiative rolls and cannot be surprised while conscious.

specialSkills.name: Arcane Eavesdropper
description: The pseudodragon gains a special sense out to 30 feet that detects active spellcasting, magical effects, or creatures concentrating on spells.
This sense reveals direction and approximate intensity but not spell details.
It is blocked by total cover and suppressed in antimagic fields.

specialSkills.name: Venom Savant
description: When a creature fails its saving throw against the pseudodragon's Sting, the poisoned condition lasts an additional hour.

specialSkills.name: Venom Control
description: When the pseudodragon hits a creature with its Sting, the target makes its Constitution saving throw with disadvantage.
On a failed saving throw, the creature is unconscious for the duration specified by the Sting.
On a successful saving throw, the creature takes additional poison damage equal to half the Sting's damage (rounded down).

specialSkills.name: Psychic Link
description: The range of the pseudodragon's telepathy with its master increases to 1 mile while on the same plane of existence.
Once per long rest, the pseudodragon can use its reaction to transmit a brief sensory snapshot to its master.

specialSkills.name: Draconic Resilience
description: The pseudodragon gains proficiency in Constitution saving throws.
When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it instead drops to 1 hit point and becomes invisible until the end of its next turn.
Once this trait is used, it cannot be used again until the pseudodragon finishes a long rest.
